resources.string:
Welcome to Lil Quad, the app that lets you fly a quadrotor! 
The app uses USB communication to send messages to the radio transmitter, which wirelessly 
transmits data to the quadrotor itself. 
 
Here are the basic controls: 
- The bar on the left controls the thrust of the quadrotor 
- The pitch and the roll of the phone intuitively control the pitch and roll of the quadrotor 
- The buttons on the right will modulate the yaw of the quadrotor 
 
Press Start to start Flying!
